After a long day you can relax on the hotel’s roof-garden, where it is possible to admire the most beautiful Sacred Domes in the city, such as Santa Maria La Nova or the Monastery of Santa Chiara, as well as a partial panorama of Vesuvio’s peak and the nearby Mountain Somma.
